name: Meteor Horror
description:
You are a dinosaur, trying to escape extinction! Avoid small meteorites, and be sure to get away from the big Meteors that come. They are all dinosaur-seeking, so use the platforms to your advantage. Survive for as long as you can!

This game was an attempt to mix a platformer and a horde-mode/rogue-like game.

Controls:

-Use A/D (or Left and Right Arrows) to move

-Spacebar to jump
